product_overview: Meu Agente is a micro SaaS that provides an AI agent team operating directly via WhatsApp for customer service, operations, and automation to reduce operational time, increase conversion, and standardize processes while ensuring data security and privacy.
core_goals: Provide 24/7 AI-powered assistance adhering to WhatsApp Business policies.
Enable seamless integration with Google Workspace (Calendar, Drive, Tasks, Gmail) for enhanced operations.
Offer financial management with income/expense tracking and export capabilities for paid plans.
Deliver specialized sub-agents like SDR, Marketing, Scheduling, Development, and Video for Business and Premium plans.
Ensure data governance, privacy compliance, and secure backup systems for premium users.
Provide tiered plans with features scaling from Free to Premium, addressing different user needs and budgets.
Support automation of WhatsApp interactions while respecting channel limits and opt-in/opt-out policies.
key_features: Phone-based authentication with session management via Supabase Auth.
Comprehensive financial management with categories, export, and filters.
Task and goal management systems with priorities, categories, and progress tracking.
Calendar and scheduling system integrated with Google Workspace and WhatsApp reminders.
Dashboard with real-time insights, charts, and quick action cards.
Real-time notification system and user profile management with privacy controls.
Role-based access and plan-based feature restrictions.
Backup system with daily off-site copies for premium users.
Support ticket system with FAQ and ticket management.
Multiple AI sub-agent types including financial, scrape, web search, SDR, marketing, scheduling, development, and video generation agents.
Dark/light theme and global search systems.
Responsive UI components built with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/UI.
Compliance with LGPD, backup policies, and messaging safeguards on WhatsApp integration.
user_flow_summary: User logs in via phone-based authentication; session and rate limiting enforce security.
Users interact with AI agents via WhatsApp using natural language for tasks like recording finances, scheduling, or lead qualification.
Financial entries, task updates, and goal tracking are managed through the app dashboard with export features for paid plans.
Business and Premium users access dedicated WhatsApp numbers, receive personalized onboarding and priority support.
Sub-agents perform specialized tasks such as web scraping (via APIs), marketing campaign analysis, and video content generation triggered by user messages.
Scheduling agents integrate appointments and tasks into Google Calendar, Drive, and Tasks with reminders sent on WhatsApp.
Reports and analytics are available through the dashboard with CSV/PDF exports for paid users.
Backups and data governance policies activate automatically for premium customers to ensure data integrity and privacy.
Support system enables users to submit tickets and access FAQs with 24/7 priority support on Business/Premium plans.
validation_criteria: Successful multi-factor authentication with phone number login and session handling.
Accurate recording and categorization of financial transactions with correct export output.
Seamless integration with Google services for scheduling, tasks, and file attachments.
Automated responses and scheduling through WhatsApp with correct handling of opt-in and messaging policies.
Availability of sub-agent functionalities per plan with restrictions properly enforced by permission system.
Dashboard and report exports generate accurate real-time insights and downloadable files.
Backup system creates daily off-site copies with periodic restoration tests for premium users.
Support ticket creation, management, and FAQ access function as expected with prioritized alerts for higher tiers.
UI consistency and responsiveness across devices with theme toggling and accessibility.
Compliance with LGPD regulations, including opt-in/out management and data retention policies.
System respects WhatsApp message limits and channel best practices to prevent blocking or spam flags.
